name: HEAT REBORN
description:
Background Story

In 2100, Republik Kugelmugel almost take over the world. It is the largest empire which has almost 5 billion people and affecting all around the world including Europe, America and Africa. After the 3rd world war, Republik Kugelmugel renamed to Cinor Empire. The capital is located at Yilifu. Cinor is an empire. However, it is a presidential government. Cinor Empire also pursues aristocracy. The people organised a rebel force named Kronoc and it is located in El Provencio. Kronoc hires Asin, which is a biotechnology company, for their genetic modified soldiers to revolt. Afterwards, Cinor Empire also hires Asin to fight back.

Features

  • Combining FPS and MMORPG elements into a single game
  • Special skill system
  • Weapon customization
  • Including maps in Hong Kong & Taiwan
